title: Is Malz OP?
body: I often get accused of picking an OP champion in games as Malz, and I'm just wondering if this is actually accurate? Is Malz indeed OP? Or is this just the usual generic bronze/silver whining?

replies.body: malz is high risk high reward and takes a fair bit of scaling to do well and quite easily countered so keep on keepin on my man
there just butt hurt cause u picked a fun champ    {{champion:90}} 4 lyfe
